texts.text: Tag is a feature which allows players to group blocks, items, and functions together using JSON files.

/tag, a command that controls scoreboard tags
Name tag, a rare item that can be used to name mobs
/scoreboard players tag, a removed command
Scoreboard, a complex gameplay mechanic utilized through commands. Scoreboard tags are a simple list of single-word strings stored in the Tags data tag of an entity.
NBT format (Named Binary Tag format)
